questions.question: The average cost for tuition and fees for public colleges is $9,410. Which statement is TRUE?

choices.answer: The costs for housing and food can double that price
All students pay the full published rate ("sticker price")
Grants (free money) increase the cost of college
The cost of public and private colleges are the same

questions.question: Which of these statements about student loans is TRUE?

choices.answer: About 50% of college grads have them
It's easy to get student loans forgiven
The average balance for recent graduates is about $30,000
If you have no job after college, no repayment is required

questions.question: Who struggles most with student debt?

choices.answer: College grads with large amounts of student debt (> $50k)
College grads with small amounts of student debt (<$10k)
College dropouts with no student debt
College dropouts with small amounts of student debt (<$5k)

questions.question: Most federal grant aid to help students pay for college is based on...

choices.answer: Grades
What state you live in
Financial need
Extracurricular activities

questions.question: What's a good rule of thumb when it comes to student debt? You should borrow no more than...

choices.answer: The cost of one year of college
The cost of four years of college
One times your expected starting salary when you graduate
Five times your expected starting salary when you graduate
